item.name: Home
item.description: So, all my friends on TikTok have been making the “perfect” french fries, and I wanted in on the fun. To be honest, the perfect fries, in my mind, can only exist when paired with kimchi. But not just raw kimchi-nope. I like my kimchi topping to be caramelized, sweet, and sticky. One of my […]
